*** THIS THREAD, AS OF 7/28/2015 (m/d/y) WILL CLOSE IN 5 DAYS. THIS IS DUE TO THE FACT THERE IS A MOD ALREADY WITH THIS CRITERIA. IF A SUBSTANTIAL NUMBER OF PEOPLE WANT IT TO STAY UP, I WONT CLOSE IT.

Good day, KSP community,

I started to get into mods about a month ago, and I discovered in RSS, Kerbin looks like earth. But then, the game is way out of balance, and I have to get Realism Overhall. I did not really like that, but I liked the simulation of the off-axis tilt of the earth, and the look of Earth-like kerbin. Please let me know if you need more information, I am willing to help. I will post a poll. If you want it, vote yes, if not, vote no. if a lot of you guys say no, or say the mod exists, then I will close the thread and move on.

Edited July 28, 2015 by RoketMan
Poll will close unless people don't want it to.
